query:
ALTER TABLE examAttempts 
ADD COLUMN answers JSON AFTER userId,
ADD COLUMN unansweredCount INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER wrongCount,
MODIFY COLUMN score INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN correctCount INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN wrongCount INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN timeSpent INT DEFAULT 0;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FZ1nxfVKsSpRCQ.c519e6f3483f --database E9go4Z3vKfQ64CyBjNz69u --execute ALTER TABLE examAttempts 
ADD COLUMN answers JSON AFTER userId,
ADD COLUMN unansweredCount INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER wrongCount,
MODIFY COLUMN score INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN correctCount INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN wrongCount INT DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN timeSpent INT DEFAULT 0;
